definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: S. Korea starts massive drills near border.
sentences.chinese: 韓國將在朝韓邊境舉行最大規模軍演。

sentences.english: First, do you have any comment on the Kaesong meeting between the DPRK and the ROK?
sentences.chinese: 第一，你對朝韓開城會晤有何評論？

sentences.english: We always endorse cooperation between the DPRK and the ROK.
sentences.chinese: 關於朝韓加強合作，我們始終持積極支持態度。

sentences.english: While China would have to support Korean unification, the US wouldn't.
sentences.chinese: 中國支持朝韓統一時，美國不會。

sentences.english: Last Sept. 30, the two Koreas hold military talks in Panmunjom.
sentences.chinese: 去年9月30日，朝韓雙方曾在板門店舉行軍事會談。

sentences.english: Community of face Han economy " it is child of assuasive of relation of Korea peninsula north and south."
sentences.chinese: “朝韓經濟共同體”是朝鮮半島南北關係緩和的產物。

sentences.english: The United States has helped to mend the rift between North and South Korea since 1953.
sentences.chinese: 美國自1953年起幫助朝韓修補裂痕。

sentences.english: South Korean tourist groups no longer travel across the heavily armed inter-Korean border.
sentences.chinese: 韓國旅行團此後不曾越過重兵駐守的朝韓邊境。

sentences.english: In addition, inter-Korean relations and succession issues are not involved.
sentences.chinese: 此外朝韓關係及接班人問題等也沒有涉及。

sentences.english: I have two questions. First, do you have any comment on the Kaesong meeting between the DPRK and the ROK?
sentences.chinese: 我有兩個問題。第一，你對朝韓開城會晤有何評論？

sentences.english: Mr. Ban has also been actively involved in issues relating to inter-Korean relations.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文先生還積極參與處理朝韓關係問題。
